member.name: T:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream
member.summary: Stream for reading and writing to a file in GridFS.
member.remarks: When using the stream for random io it is possible to produce chunks in the begining and middle of the file that are not full size followed by other chunks that are full size. This only affects the md5 sum that is calculated on the file on close. Because of this do not rely on the md5 sum of a file when doing random io. Writing to the stream sequentially works fine and will produce a consistent md5.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.#ctor(MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileInfo,MongoDB.Driver.IMongoCollection,MongoDB.Driver.IMongoCollection,System.IO.FileAccess)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads data from the stream into the specified array. It will fill the array in starting at offset and adding count bytes returning the number of bytes read from the stream.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Copies from the source array into the grid file.
member.param: A The offset within the source array.
A The number of bytes from within the source array to copy.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.Flush
member.summary: Flushes any changes to current chunk to the database. It can be called in client code at any time or it will automatically be called on Close() and when the stream position moves off the bounds of the current chunk.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.Seek(System.Int64,System.IO.SeekOrigin)
member.summary: Seek to any location in the stream. Seeking past the end of the file is allowed. Any writes to that location will cause the file to grow to that size. Any holes that may be created from the seek will be zero filled on close.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.SetLength(System.Int64)
member.summary: Sets the length of this stream to the given value.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.Close
member.summary: Close the stream and flush any changes to the database.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.MoveTo(System.Int64)
member.summary: Moves the current position to the new position. If this causes a new chunk to need to be loaded it will take care of flushing the buffer and loading a new chunk.
member.param: A designating where to go to.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.LoadOrCreateChunk(System.Int32)
member.summary: Loads a chunk from the chunks collection if it exists. Otherwise it creates a blank chunk Document.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.TruncateAfter(System.Int64)
member.summary: Deletes all chunks after the specified position and clears out any extra bytes if the position doesn't fall on a chunk boundry.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.EnsureNoHoles
member.summary: Makes sure that at least a skelton chunk exists for all numbers. If not the MD5 calculation will fail on a sparse file.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: P:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.GridFileInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the grid file info.

member.name: P:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.CanRead
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports reading.
member.returns: true if the stream supports reading; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.CanWrite
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports writing.
member.returns: true if the stream supports writing; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.CanSeek
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current stream supports seeking.
member.returns: true if the stream supports seeking; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.Length
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets the length in bytes of the stream.
member.returns: A long value representing the length of the stream in bytes.
member.exception: A class derived from Stream does not support seeking.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.

member.name: P:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileStream.Position
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the position within the current stream.
member.returns: The current position within the stream.
member.exception: The stream does not support seeking.
Methods were called after the stream was closed.

member.name: T:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileInfo
member.summary: Provides instance methods for the creation, copying, deletion, moving, and opening of files, and aids in the creation of GridFileStream objects. The api is very similar to the FileInfo class in System.IO.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileInfo.#ctor(MongoDB.Driver.IMongoDatabase,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Creates the file named FileName and returns the GridFileStream

member.summary: Creates the specified mode.

member.summary: Creates the specified mode.

member.summary: Creates a write-only GridFileStream to an existing file.

member.summary: Permanently removes a file from the database.

member.summary: Renames a file.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileInfo.Truncate
member.summary: Deletes all data in a file and sets the length to 0.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileInfo.CalcMD5
member.summary: Calcs the M d5.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileInfo.UpdateInfo
member.summary: Updates the aliases, contentType, metadata and uploadDate in the database.
member.remarks: To rename a file use the MoveTo method.

member.name: M:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileInfo.Refresh
member.summary: Reloads the file information from the database.
member.remarks: The data in the database will not reflect any changes done through an open stream until it is closed.

member.summary: Toes the document.

member.name: P:MongoDB.GridFS.GridFileInfo.Length
